Original:
現在的菜單變簡單了，想吃的漢堡已不在菜單上，好在還是有沙拉🥗，我老是覺得颱風天去餐廳用餐，最實惠的就是吃沙拉🥗，雖然上桌時看到沙拉的份量變小了，但是爽脆的蘿蔓生菜再加上鹹鮮的醬料，上面居然放的是雞肉沙嗲，滿有創意的。

這裡的 #爆米花濃湯 是很有特色的一道湯品，濃郁帶著玉米甜味的湯裡吃得到煙燻雞肉丁還有爆米花🍿，有點邪惡有點童趣的湯，每次來都要喝一碗。因為沒有漢堡可吃，只好點了 #水牛瑪格麗特披薩 ，很久沒吃披薩🍕了，沒想到這裡的披薩居然還頗有水準，薄軟帶脆的餅皮上，新鮮生菜覆蓋著莫扎瑞拉起司和許多牛番茄片，不知不覺我居然吃了三片，真是難得。

炒蘑菇有點鹹，洋菇和香菇混合，也炒得有點水，可惜了。

可他們家甜點有點弱，下酒菜白天不供應，白天吃不到我想吃的薯條🍟，雖然有點遺憾，但是作為一個吃個便飯的地方，還是不錯的。
EN:
The current menu is simpler. The burger I want to eat is no longer on the menu. Fortunately, there are still salads. I always think that the typhoon goes to the restaurant for dining. The most affordable thing is to eat salad. It has become smaller, but the crispy Luo Vancoules plus salty sauce, which is actually a chicken sauce on it, full of creativity.

The#popcorn soup here is a very distinctive soup. It is rich with the sweetness of corn sweets and the smoky chicken diced and popcorn. Drink a bowl.Because there is no hamburger to eat, I have to order#buffalo Margaret pizza. I haven't eaten pizza for a long time. I did not expect that the pizza here was quite standard. The Rura cheese and many beef tomato slices, unknowingly I ate three pieces, it was rare.

The frying mushrooms are a bit salty, mixed with mushrooms and shiitake mushrooms, and fried a little water, unfortunately.

But their desserts are a bit weak. The dishes are not supplied during the day, and they can't eat the fries I want to eat during the day. Although a bit of a pity, it is still good as a place to eat a meal.

Original:
優點:
1.餐點滿好吃的，雞翅、玉米片、薯條、炒牛舌等都還滿有水準的

缺點
1.這間酒吧主場應該在室外，但下雨天只能在室內，多人聚的話可能會有問題畢竟室內能容納四人以上的位子真的很少，還跟餐廳共用。
2.不知道是不是人手不足，上菜速度慢得離譜，食物和調酒都是，印象最深的是炒牛舌，從點菜到上菜等了一個多小時，反應兩次才上，在想是不是去跟樓下春大直商場的店家借牛舌了....
3.調酒種類超級少，應該是各大飯店裡面偏少的，不知道是不是沒有常駐調酒師? 連高雄Indigo的頂樓bar種類都屌打這裡。不過少就算了，才晚上九點就有調酒賣完了，啤酒機也壞了....
4.售價偏高，一杯調酒420-450起跳，逼近文華東方M.O. bar還有隔壁萬豪Igne's bar，但口味真的比不上...另外連水都是要收費的。
5.餐點送上來，沒有送上餐具，也沒有給衛生紙或濕紙巾。不知道是要我們直接整盤拿起來啃嗎....基本服務根本零分

包含入住這間飯店的整體表現，真的是讓人不會想再來耶....
EN:
advantage:
1. The meals are delicious, chicken wings, corn slices, fries, fried beef tongue, etc. are still full of standards

shortcoming
1. This bar should be outdoors at home, but it can only be indoors in rainy days. If multiple people gather, there may be problems. After all, there are very few seats in the room that can accommodate more than four people, and they are also shared with the restaurant.
2. I do n’t know if it ’s a lack of manpower. The speed of serving is slow, and the food and bartending are all. The deepest impression is fried beef tongue. It’ s more than an hour from ordering to cooking. Do you want to go with the shops downstairs and downstairs to borrow beef tongue ...
3. There are very few types of bartending. There should be fewer restaurants in major restaurants. I do n’t know if there is no resident bartender? Even the top floor BAR of Kaohsiung Indigo is hit here.However, even if it is less, it will be finished at 9 o'clock in the evening, and the beer machine is broken ...
4. The price is high, a cup of bartending 420-450 jump, approaching Mandarin Oriental M.O. BAR, and Marriott Igne's Bar next door, but the taste is really not as good as ... even the water is charged.
5. The meal was delivered, and the tableware was not given, nor did the toilet paper or wet paper towel.I don’t know if we want us to pick it up directly .... Basic services are fundamentally zero

Including the overall performance of staying in this hotel, it really makes people want to come again ...

Original:

Original: 不要讓自己被高評價所欺騙，這個地方換了主人，體驗並不愉快。首先，我很驚訝當他們從菜單上刪除所有雞尾酒時仍然稱其為酒吧。葡萄酒類別的選擇很荒謬，只有一種選擇。我喝了一杯金湯力水，我和我的朋友想知道裡面是否有杜松子酒。最後最好的，我想喝一點，我要了他們的肉醬。有人告訴我他們沒有合適的義大利麵，但他們可以搭配義大利扁麵條，好吧，我不是純粹主義者。菜端上來的時候我很難理解它怎麼會賣到500多新台幣，看起來不太有食慾。還是跟著去了，讓服務生知道少了菜單上提到的荷包蛋。 15分鐘後，當我吃完後，我得到了一個荷包蛋，真是個笑話！
EN: Don't let yourself be deceived by high evaluation. This place has changed the owner and the experience is not happy.First of all, I was surprised that they were still called a bar when they deleted all cocktails on the menu.The choice of wine categories is ridiculous, only one choice.I drank a glass of golden soup, and my friends and I wanted to know if there was Du Songzi wine inside.In the end, I want to drink a little, I want their meat sauce.Someone told me that they did not have a suitable pasta, but they could match the Italian flat noodles. Well, I am not a pureist.It is difficult for me to understand how it sells for more than 500 NT $ when the dishes come up.Let's follow, let the waiter know that there is less poached eggs mentioned on the menu.After 15 minutes, when I finished eating, I got a poached egg, it was a joke!

Original:
位於飯店四樓，交通便利，有一個漂亮的戶外設施，但天氣很冷，風很大，所以我們不得不在裡面用餐。好吧，飲料還不錯，巧克力飲料還不錯。點了玉米片和蘑菇。我的朋友很高興嘗試玉米片，但我們很失望！薯片上融化了一些奇怪的無味奶酪，使所有薯片粘在一起成為一大塊。還有油膩的莎莎醬、酪梨醬和酸奶油。  這基本上是一個拆開的玉米卷，沒有肉……這絕對是錯誤的起司種類，我們要了起司醬。他們實際上有起司醬，但我們很難吃它，因為薯條是一塊實心的。以 13 美元的價格，你完全會期待一些美食！ 蘑菇只是一碗蘑菇，沒有太多味道，9 美元。

老實說，如果你要在酒店以如此高的價格提供小吃，那麼標準應該是美味的，而不僅僅是一些令人失望的東西。作為飯店客人，您可以享受折扣，並且可以將其計入您的房間。
EN:
It is located on the fourth floor of the hotel, with convenient transportation and a beautiful outdoor facility, but the weather is very cold and the wind is strong, so we have to dine inside.Well, the drink is not bad, and the chocolate drink is not bad.Ordered corn slices and mushrooms.My friend is glad to try corn slices, but we are disappointed!Some strange tasteless cheese melted on the potato chips, making all potato chips stick together to become a large piece.There are also greasy Sasha sauce, avocado sauce and yogurt.This is basically an open corn roll, without meat ... This is definitely a kind of wrong cheese type. We asked the cheese sauce.They actually have cheese sauce, but we are hard to eat it because the fries are solid.At a price of $ 13, you will look forward to some food!Mushroom is just a bowl of mushrooms, without much taste, $ 9.

Honestly, if you want to provide snacks at such a high price at the hotel, the standard should be delicious, not just something disappointing.As hotel guests, you can enjoy discounts and can be included in your room.

Original: 我和我的妻子在該地區，我們在聚會後想喝一杯。  我們偶然發現了SneaKOut，走進去時驚喜地看到現場音樂表演。  生啤酒也是A+。   更不用說景色和氛圍了<333
EN: My wife and I in the area, we want to have a drink after the party.We accidentally discovered Sneakout, and when I walked in, I was surprised to see the live music performance.Raw beer is also A+.Not to mention the scenery and atmosphere <333

Original: 屋頂休息室的氛圍很棒，工作人員非常友善，價格也很合理。啤酒的選擇可以更好，但仍然是 5 星
EN: The atmosphere of the roof lounge is great, the staff is very friendly, and the price is reasonable.The choice of beer can be better, but it is still 5 stars
